SEARCH
Package domain

Class Machine

java.lang.Object
domain.Machine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject, Serializable
@Entity public class Machine extends Object implements Serializable, Subject
Represents a machine in a production site. A machine is associated with a Site, a User (technician), and contains information about its operational status, maintenance dates, and production data.
See Also:

    • Machine

      private Machine(Machine.Builder builder)
      Constructs a new Machine with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      site - the site where the machine is located
      technician - the responsible technician
      code - the machine code
      location - the location of the machine
      productInfo - information about the product
      machineStatus - the operational status
      productionStatus - the production status
      futureMaintenance - the next maintenance date

  • Method Details

    • getUpTimeInHours

      public double getUpTimeInHours()
      Calculates the uptime of the machine since its last maintenance, in hours.
      Returns:
      the uptime in hours, or 0.0 if lastMaintenance is null
